application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of enhanced sound insulation value of at least 5dB above the maximum Building Regulations value for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses, namely, in adjoining dwellings, namely, kitchen/dining/living/bath and shower rooms above/below bedrooms of separate dwellings and staircase adjoining bedrooms pursuant to condition 5 of planning permission ref: 222254FUL dated 18/07/2022  for: Conversion of existing dwelling house into 2 self-contained flats and provision of associated refuse, cycle storage and amenity space; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope
